Photos: Dead Cross Live @ The Showbox

By Iggy Pot - August 28, 2017

Dead Cross is currently touring the US in support of their self-titled LP out now on Ipecac Recordings/ Three One G. Featuring Dave Lombardo (Slayer/Fantômas) on drums, Justin Pearson (The Locust/Retox) on bass, Mike Crain (Retox/on guitar, as well as Mike Patton (Faith No More/Fantômas) on vocals, this super group is currently revitalizing hardcore with their caustic and energetic live shows.

The band’s weekend stop at the Showbox in Seattle on Saturday night was no exception and fans in the pit were chomping at the bit to let out some aggression. Patton lead the charge vocally, while the group’s virtuousic skills yielded an equally punishing sonic attack. Live Eye Tv photographer Mike Walker was their to catch all the action and you can checkout photos from the show below, a s well as the band’s upcoming tour dates.

Dead Cross Live 2017

  • Aug 29 Ace of Spades Sacramento, CA
  • Sep 08 Baltimore Soundstage Baltimore, MD
  • Sep 10 Union Transfer Philadelphia, PA
  • Sep 11 Royale Boston Boston, MA
  • Sep 12 Gramercy Theatre New York, NY
  • Sep 13 Warsaw Brooklyn, NY
  • Sep 14 Douglas Park Chicago, IL
  • Sep 15 Saint Andrews Hall Detroit, MI
  • Sep 16 Riot Fest Chicago, IL
  • Sep 17 Turner Hall Ballroom Milwaukee, WI
  • Sep 19 First Avenue Minneapolis, MN
  • Sep 20 Liberty Hall Lawrence, KS
  • Sep 23 Ogden Theatre Denver, CO
